ISSUE.TITLE: Android x86 Found elf built without Stack Protection Question
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Accroding the Hint Built with option -fstack-protector, but no effect with x86 platform. so i find the source code ,which i get: ```python if section_header['sh_entsize'] > 0: for i in range(section_header['sh_size'] // section_header['sh_entsize']): entry = elffile.decode_sym( section_header['sh_offset'] + i * section_header['sh_entsize']) name = elffile.decode_string( strtab_section + entry['st_name']) if name == '__stack_chk_guard': has_sp = True ``` but i when i print “name ” on x86 platform, i find "__stack_chk_fail" like "__stack_chk_guard", if i use flag += -fno-stack-protector, i also find "__stack_chk_fail" in x86's "name". Is there something wrong with the judgement, or just my mistake? how can i fix this problem? thanks.
